#summary Details on getCategoryList() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function to get the list of Delcampe's categories you're able to use in items definition ([addItemAuction]() or [addItemFixedPrice]())


=== Call ===

 * syntax : getCategoryList(string token, string language, integer parent)

 * parameter 1 : _string_ : secret token
 * parameter 2 : _character_ : the language in wich you want the categories. You have to specify one of the following values :
  * 'E' : english
  * 'F' : français
  * 'I' : italiano
  * 'S' : español
  * 'G' : german
  * 'N' : nederlands
 * parameter 3 : _integer_ : the parent category ID. By default 0 to return the main categories

=== Response ===

 * response : _array_ : the response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : 
   * if call ok : _array_ : list of Delcampe's categories (regarding parent ID set)
   * if call not ok : _string_ : error message

 * notification : none

=== Code example (PHP) ===
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
list($success, $token) = $objSoapClient->authenticateUser('MyPersonalApiKey');

if (true === $success) {
  $return = $objSoapClient->getCategoryList($token, 'E', 0);
}
}}}
